sub_topic: Show that every group of order 16 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C16, the dihedral group D8, or the non-abelian group of order 16.
message_1: Consider a group G of order 16. Determine whether G is isomorphic to the cyclic group C16, the dihedral group D8, or the non-abelian group of order 16. Provide a detailed explanation for your answer, including any necessary mathematical proof.
